titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to terminate the advance payment of the earned income tax credit.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to terminate the advance payment of the earned income tax credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal provisions that provide for the advance payment of the earned income tax credit.
